SELECT LEVEL, reply_num, com_num, parent_reply_num, reply_content, reply_created_at, member_num, member_name FROM ( SELECT R.reply_num as reply_num, R.com_num as com_num, R.parent_reply_num, R.reply_content as reply_content, R.reply_created_at as reply_created_at, M.member_num as member_num, M.member_name as member_name FROM reply R LEFT OUTER JOIN member M ON R.member_num = M.member_num WHERE R.com_num = #{comNum} ) START WITH parent_reply_num is null CONNECT BY PRIOR reply_num = parent_reply_num ORDER SIBLINGS BY reply_num
